HAL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 05 Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 16:31 IST
 Hindustan Aeronautics Limited
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 23,000 to 23,000




FOLLOW

The Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the HAL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application form, pay scale, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technician	05	Diploma in Mechanical Engineering

HAL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the Written Test.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 23,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the HAL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the HAL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form at the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Dy. General Manager (HR) Engine Division Hindustan Aeronautics Limited, Bangalore Complex, PB No. 9310 BANGALORE 560 093.

Important Dates:

Starting date	06-08-2025
Closing date	25-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here
